text: 2007 The European Society of Definition: A myocardial disorder Cardiology Working in which the heart muscle is Group on myocardial structurally and functionally and pericardial abnormal, in the absence of diseases coronary artery disease, hyper- tension, valvular disease, and congenital heart disease suffi- cient to cause the observed myocardial abnormality.> Classification: -DCM -HCM -RCM -ARVR -Unclassified group These groups are further divided into familial (genetic) and non- familial (non-genetic) subgroups.
